class.name: TLFontFamily
class.brief_description: A set of fonts that make up a font family.

method.name: get_face
method.description: Returns main font face of specified style.

method.name: get_liked_face_for_script
method.description: Returns substitution font face of specified style and script.

method.name: has_style
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if font family has specified style.

method.name: remove_style
method.description: Removes all font faces of specified style from family.

method.name: set_face
method.description: Sets main font face of specified style.

method.name: set_liked_face_for_script
method.description: Sets substitution font face of specified style and script.
